          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magneten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aimants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ímãs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Magneti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγνήτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Imanes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the north and south seeking pole of various magnets.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north-seeking pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repulsion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south-seeking pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Nord- und des Südens 
suchenden Pfosten der verschiedenen Magneten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le pôle recherchant du
nord et du sud de divers aimants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o pólo procurando norte 
e do sul de vários ímãs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il polo di ricerca di 
sud e del nord di vari magneti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το Βορρά και νότο 
επιδιώκων τον πόλο των διάφορων μαγνητών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el poste que busca del 
norte y del sur de varios imanes.</string>
          </description>
